title: Having issues Patching 6.12? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

We just have three words for you /remake feature:

***About damn time***

http://i.imgur.com/3aSZqmp.jpg

If you’re having issues patching 6.12 you can look below for a fix! If none of those steps help you comment below and we’ll get your patcher patched up in no... time... :D

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: When I join a game, everything is fine until the game starts, my whole screen goes black and it stays like that. And then I get in trouble for leaving a game after I restart my computer.
Same here. I'm on Mac
I'm on Mac too, is there a problem with our software or something?
im on windows and its doing the same prob uninstall thats what im doing ill tell you if it works
alright uninstall legaue it worked i uninstalled and got back on and it works now. the ping is even lower now than it was{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I have windows and it wont even open that game so I cant even login
I am having a problem where my pvp.net patcher kernal stops working when I try and open lol anyone know how to fix this.
Run League of Legends as an administrator should fix the problem (You'll have to reinstall)
I hope that will work!! :D
What if I reinstalled 3 times and still crash at 99% ? ... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
didn't work for me
(>{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
BRO just buy a really expensive windows gaming pc it won't crash anymore!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

so i went back to play again like 3 hours later and then it tells me randomly its scanning files, im not sure if this is an update for dark star thresh

although some of the skins are corrupt so that might be it

Hey! sorry for the bother, everything worked out pretty well with the new patch, however, every game i've played since then has had really low fps. i'm not sure if that just my computer not being able to keep up with the game or what. (I don't think this is the case seeing as i have an Alienware 18.) Would this be a corrupt file that was messing up my fps? or something else entirely?

You may need to update you drivers if you're having FPS issues. Go ahead and run through our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and see if that helps you.

When I click to open league, the League of Legends logo appears with a white/gray bar under it and sometimes there is a little bit of orange in the bar near the beginning as if it's going to progress. After a few minutes of nothing happening, it just disappears. I would really like some help. I've tried what seems like everything to fix this problem.

It sounds like your firewall may be blocking the client from opening at all. Go ahead and run through this [Permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and it should allow League to pop back up. If your client continues to act up after going through the guide let me know.
Oh wait never mind, it's stuck at 99% and saying Applying Patches...what should I do?

This is when the client is installing the new patch files. Maybe give it a little time since it has been making progress, but if it's stuck for a long time... there are a few things you can try, in this order!

1. Check that your HDD is not full. If it's too full then it won't have enough space to add the new files.
2. Make sure League is installed to a standard directory. (For Windows, this is usually the C drive.)
3. [Set up your permissions](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ). If your OS doesn't have the right permissions, it won't allow new files to be added.

That should do it! If you still have issues just reply back :)

6.12 has put me through hell over the last six days. First My Patch would get an unspecified error when i hit 38% this has happened at least a dozen times. I have disabled firewalls, deleted files, reinstalled the game 5 times, switched servers, the list goes on and on. I then think It is working it made it to 99% after 5 hours and it has been stuck there for almost an hour. I am so frustrated. I wanted Dark Star, I have wanted to play but cant. This has never happened to me before ever. I have asked for help and have gotten none from Riot. Can anyone help me?
{{champion:163}}

My patcher froze at 46% with the message "Applying Patches...". However, I fixed it by simply restarting it and letting it update again. Now it worked great! Just a tip if anyone else has the same problem :-)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I even disabled windows firewall to see if that would help but its still not working. Somebody please help.
